description.value: A set of codes that define a whether a Multi-cancer early detection signal was detected or not. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - 1854981000000108 | Multi-cancer early detection signal detected - 1854991000000105 | Multi-cancer early detection signal not detected

display.value: Multi-cancer early detection signal not detected
